TextLibrary.Text: Some Pirates left a message for us, telling us that if we want to get our hands on another PSI Weapon, we'd better go to Quaris.
Some Pirates left a message for us, telling us that if we want to get our hands on another PSI Weapon, we'd better go to Quaris.
Hmm, unless we are in good standing with these Pirates, I doubt they'll really want to deal with us.
Hmm, unless we are in good standing with these Pirates, I doubt they'll really want to deal with us.
True, so once you've made the necessary preparations, we should head to the Quaris System.
True, so once you've made the necessary preparations, we should head to the Quaris System.
